meanings.definition: A person responsible for managing and organizing a business or organization.
meanings.sent1: The administrators at the school ensure everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The hospital administrators oversee the daily operations of the medical facility.
meanings.sent3: The administrators decided to have a pizza party to boost morale among the staff.
meanings.sent4: The administrators are the backbone of the company, keeping everything in order.
meanings.sent5: The administrators are like conductors, orchestrating the different departments to work together seamlessly.

meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of carrying out tasks and duties within a system or process.
meanings.sent1: The administrators of the website update the content regularly.
meanings.sent2: The IT administrators troubleshoot technical issues for the company.
meanings.sent3: The administrators made a game out of completing their tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The administrators are like puzzle solvers, fitting all the pieces together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The administrators handle tasks like expert jugglers, keeping everything in the air without dropping anything.
